programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: After accidentally returning to Earth, Crichton discovers he is in 1985 and he has altered the time line, causing his father to be scheduled to fly on the doomed shuttle Challenger.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The aliens meet an amazed and apprehensive public; Crichton tries to readjust to life on Earth.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Chiana purchases an abused slave girl from a passing trading ship.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Scorpius takes Crichton, D'Argo and Rygel to an advanced training camp where students learn mental discipline.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: The women of Moya stumble upon a secret meeting that will change the future of the Uncharted Territories.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: After trapping Crichton and the others on a Scarran base, Scorpius reveals his true agenda.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton and Scorpius travel through a wormhole to a mixed-up version of Moya in search of abducted Aeryn.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: We're So Screwed Trilogy: Part I: Fetal Attraction
programme.desc: Moya's crew traces Aeryn to a freighter at a scarecrow border station; Noranti releases a deadly, contagious virus to keep the vessel in dock.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: We're So Screwed Trilogy: Part II: Hot to Katratzi
programme.desc: Moya's crew travels to a Scarran base where Scorpius is being tortured for wormhole information.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: We're So Screwed Trilogy: Part III: La Bomba
programme.desc: After thwarting Crichton's escape plan, Scorpius denies he is a Scarran spy.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: With their Crystherium stores low, the Scarrans must travel to Earth through a wormhole as those flowers grow there; with Pilots help, Crichton tries to collapse the wormhole leading back to Earth.

programme.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
programme.desc: John Crichton and his love Aeryn Sun are reunited; the wormhole knowledge that Crichton possesses makes him a target in an intergalactic war.

programme.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars
programme.desc: With the birth of his child fast approaching, Crichton must find a way to use the wormhole technology to bring an end to the Scarran-Peacekeeper war.

programme.title: A Look Back At Farscape With Brian Henson And Rockne O'Bannon, Interviewed By Adam Savage
programme.sub-title: A Look Back At Farscape With Brian Henson And Rockne O'Bannon, Interviewed By Adam Savage
programme.desc: Behind the scenes of Farscape with Brian Henson and Rockne O'Bannon.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Astronaut John Crichton is accidentally hurled across a universe and thrust into the middle of a space battle after his ship is swallowed by a wormhole.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Giant space-cockroaches invade the ship, infest the corridors and clog the vents, causing a rise in temperature which endangers Aeryn.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.sub-title: Back and Back and Back to the Future
programme.desc: A sensual alien seduces men to obtain a weapon of mass destruction; Crichton experiences mental flashes of the future.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: For trade with the Tavleks, Rygel (John Eccleston, Jonathan Hardy) takes a crystal essential to Moya's survival.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton and a female Peacekeeper Tech, left behind by Capt. Crais, join forces to save Moya when a race of scavengers attacks.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Crichton must free D'Argo from the influence of a thought-altering plant.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: Moya crash-lands on a planet to avoid being traced by the Peacekeepers, and Crichton (Ben Browder) soon realizes that he has become an alien to the inhabitants.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: When an evil sorcerer engineers a deadly contest between Crichton and Crais, Zhaan must rouse a dark power within herself to rescue Crichton.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: When the crew seeks out a genetic scientist who can provide them with charts to their homeworlds, the scientist secretly injects Aeryn with Pilot's DNA.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: After D'Argo suffers a mishap during a maintenance check on Moya, he is tormented by flashbacks, and the ship strikes out at the crew.

programme.title: Farscape
programme.desc: While gathering data to re-create a wormhole, Crichton and Aeryn are confronted by wolflike bounty hunters in search of Moya's crew.
